feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T08:06:18.791306Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;让事情脱离谈判的“三件事”练习（2011）</stitle>; <id>;https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/trithings.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07- 24T03:06:02.688619Z</updated>; <link href="https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;“三件事”练习是一种从演讲中提取有价值信息的方法。目标是将演讲中的三个关键要点写在一张纸或索引卡上。这些要点可以是定理、激发问题、问题或演讲中突出的任何其他内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the- Three-things-exercise-for-getting-things-out-of-talks-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Debian riscv64</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-riscv64.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T02:06:02.784594Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-ris cv64.html"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;经过多年的努力，Debian riscv64现已成为官方架构。该端口需要重新启动、修复错误并重新安装构建守护程序，然后才能发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debian-riscv64" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;卡里姆·阿卜杜尔·贾巴尔：李小龙和我</stitle>; <id>;https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T06:06:02.786187Z</updated>; <link href="https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me"/>; <作者>; <name>;yla92</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yla92</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2f1 9825b-4e4c-4b40-a089-f0848ed5362a_1080x1080.jpeg" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：220 像素；" />;<br />;五十年前，卡里姆·阿卜杜勒·贾巴尔得知李小龙去世的消息，这对他打击很大，因为李小龙不仅是他的武术老师，也是他的亲密朋友。 Abdul-Jabbar 描述了他多年来所经历的巨大损失，并反思了如果李小龙没有在 32 岁时去世，他会如何生活。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kareem-abdul-jabbar-bruce-lee-and-me" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843514" target=" _blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Llama2.c：在一个纯 C 文件中推理 llama 2</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:06:02.787 005Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c"/>; <作者>; <name>;anjneymidha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anjneymidha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karpathy/llama2.c/master/assets/llama_cute.jpg" style="width ：220px；高度：220px；” />;<br />;使用此代码，您可以在 PyTorch 中从头开始训练 Llama 2 LLM 架构，将权重保存到原始二进制文件中，并将其加载到 C 文件中进行推理。 C 文件可以通过简单的方法以交互速率运行合理大小的模型。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama2-c-inference-llama-2-in-one-file-of-pure-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838051" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我的笔绘图之旅</stitle>; <id>;https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:06:02.787738Z</updated>; <link href="https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments"/>; <author>; <名称>;adamfuhrer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adamfuhrer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.adamfuhrer.com/assets/images/main-gradient.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;多伦多前端工程师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-my-pen-plotting-journey" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;死亡金属英语（2013）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.invisibleoranges.com/death-metal-english/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:06:02.788479Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/death-metal-english/"/>; <author>; <name>;cdme</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cdme</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/23/suffocation-thumb-e1383930752525-1052x592.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124像素；” />;<br />;Vastum 的死亡金属英语歌词使用残酷和夸张的隐喻来表达色情和性行为。死亡金属乐队使用死亡金属英语让他们的歌词听起来更加残酷并唤起邪恶感。死亡金属英语的特点是使用大词、形容词、介词短语、进行时、被动语态、古老或伪圣经的措辞、夸张的隐喻以及不合逻辑或无意义的句子。它可以应用于任何主题，将普通的短语变成病态的死亡金属歌曲。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#death-metal-english-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821808" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;育碧帐户（包括游戏）可因不活动而永久删除</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pcgamer.com/your-ubisoft-account-can-be-suspended-and-subsequently-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity-take-your-games-library-with-it/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T06:06:02.789518Z </updated>; <link href="https://www.pcgamer.com/your-ubisoft-account-can-be-suspended-and-subsequently-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity-take-your-games-library-with-it/"/>; <author>; <name>;yabatopia</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yabatopia</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/KXhtHDz2BcAgX7KYcVgLCJ-320-80.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：123px；" />;<br />;让育碧帐户处于非活动状态太长时间会导致其面临被永久删除的风险。育碧支持人员确认了一封电子邮件的合法性，该电子邮件通知用户因不活动而关闭帐户。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ubisoft-account-include-games-can-be-permanently-deleted-for-inactivity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843572" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ldd 任意代码执行 (2009)</stitle>; <id>;https://catonmat.net/ldd- Arbitration-code-execution</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T21:06:02.790465Z</updated>; <link href="https://catonmat.net/ldd- Arbitration-code-execution"/>; <author >; <name>;xk3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xk3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://catonmat.net/images/catonmat-logo-clean.png" style="width: 220px; height: 88px;" />;<br />;ldd 实用程序可用于确定可执行文件的动态库依赖项，但也可被利用来运行任意代码。本文探讨了此漏洞并提供了获取系统管理员权限的社会工程场景。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ldd-centric-code-execution-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36839800" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;HP 45（以及 35 和 80）计算器模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T04:06:02.791258Z</updated>; <link href="https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>; linsomniac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=linsomniac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://sarahkmarr.com/hp1973Window.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;HP-1973 是一个基于 Python 的计算器模拟器，可以运行 HP-45、HP-35 和 HP-80 计算器的 ROM 代码。它提供了一个带有各种自定义选项的 GUI 界面，并提供了有关计算器内部工作原理的详细帮助。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hp-45-and-35-and-80-calculator-emulator" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Icon Buddy – 100K+ 开源 SVG 图标，完全可定制</stitle>; <id>;https://ic onbuddy.app/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T18:06:02.792022Z</更新>; <link href="https://iconbuddy.app/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mddanishyusuf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mddanishyusuf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// iconbuddy.app/icongroup-2-left.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：173px；" />;<br />;我们有多种格式可供选择，因此您可以下载您想要的格式的图标。我们有 SVG、PNG、WEBP、JSX、VUE 和 BASE64、URL、CSS 背景截图、HTML 图像标签。我们拥有一切。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#icon-buddy-100k-open-source-svg-icons-very-customizable" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837442" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;教您的法学硕士用事实而非虚构来回答</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.myscale.com/2023/07/17/teach-your-llm-vector-sql/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T23:06:02.792727Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.myscale.com/20 23/07/17/teach-your-llm-vector-sql/"/>; <作者>; <name>;jinqueeny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jinqueeny</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.myscale.com/assets/img/chatgpt-hallucination-response.435cec3e.png" style="width: 2 20 像素；高度：122 像素；" />;<br />;大型语言模型 (LLM) 是先进的人工智能系统，可以回答广泛的问题。然而，他们可能会对不熟悉的话题做出不准确的反应，这被称为幻觉。为了提高法学硕士的准确性，在查询中添加事实和支持文档非常重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#teach-your-llm-to-answer-with-facts-not-fiction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840728" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Inkscape 1.3</stitle>; <id>;https://inkscape.org/news/2023/07/23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T07:06:02.794333Z</updated>; <link href="https://inkscape.org/news/20 23/07/23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/"/>; <author>; <name>;Reventlov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Reventlov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.inkscape.org/media/news/uploads/about-screen-contest-1-3-splash.png" style="width: 220 像素；高度：83 像素；" />;<br />;Inkscape 推出 1.3 版，重点是高效组织工作 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inkscape-1-3" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843794" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;VirtualBox 7.0.10 下载链接已消失</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20230723100307/https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:06:02.795317Z</updated >; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20230723100307/https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads"/>; <作者>; <name>;trashburger</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=trashburger</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://web.archive.org/web/202307 23100309im_/https://www.virtualbox.org/graphics/vboxlogodown.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：77px；" />;<br />;如果您正在寻找最新的 VirtualBox 6.1 软件包，请参阅 VirtualBox 6.1 版本。版本 6.1 将继续受支持到 2023 年 12 月。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#virtualbox-7-0-10-download-links-have-disappeared" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841272" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 DEA 制定的美国参议院法案目标端到端加密</stitle>; <id>;https://therecord.media/senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-drugs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:06:02 .796302Z</updated>; <link href="https://therecord.media/senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-drugs"/>; <作者>; <name>;walterbell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=walterbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.therecord.796302Z</updated>;媒体/上传/Suzanne_Smalley_27e80bc465.png?w=3840" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;一项要求社交媒体公司、加密通信提供商和其他在线服务向美国缉毒局 (DEA) 报告其平台上的毒品活动的法案已提交参议院审议。该法案引起了隐私倡导者的担忧，他们认为该法案将公司变成了事实上的缉毒机构，并威胁到端到端加密。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-senate-bill-crafted-with-dea-targets-end-to-end-encryption" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841369" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么框架向前倾斜（2015）</stitle>; <id>;https://chcollins.com/100Billion/2015/02/why-frames-tilt-forward/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:06:02.798238Z</updated>; <link href="https://chcollins. com/100Billion/2015/02/why-frames-tilt-forward/"/>; <author>; <name>;theospears</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=theospears</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://chcollins.com/100Billion/wp-content/uploads/hang-tension3-300x2 18.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：160px；" />;<br />;当电线连接到框架的背面并且框架的质心位于该点的前面时，框架向前倾斜。质心距车架后部越远，扭矩越大，车架倾斜越大。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-frames-tilt-forward-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840282" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;男子因运行 Tor 出口节点而被判犯有儿童色情罪</stitle>; <id>;https://lowendbox.com/blog/man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:06:02.799219Z</updated>; <link href=" https://lowendbox.com/blog/man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/"/>; <author>; <name>;h0ek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=h0ek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lowendbox.com/wp-content/up加载/2023/07/william-tor.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;LowEndTalk 的长期成员 William Weber 因与在 TOR 网络上运营的儿童色情团伙有关而遭到奥地利政府的搜查。大量电脑、枪支和其他物品被没收，韦伯可能被指控传播和可能制作儿童色情制品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;古斯塔夫·莫罗的神秘画作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thecollector.com/gustave-moreau-paintings/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:06:02.802027Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.thecollector.com/gustave-moreau-paintings/" />; <author>; <name>;prismatic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prismatic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.thecollector.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/gustave-moreau-paintings.jpg?width=1400&quality=70" style="width: 220px; height: 127"像素；” />;<br />;古斯塔夫·莫罗以传统学院派画家的身份开始了他的职业生涯，并在巴黎沙龙展出。在一系列负面评论之后，这位艺术家退出了社会，七年没有崭露头角。他重返巴黎艺术界后所展示的辉煌而梦幻的画作震惊了评论家，并激励了新一代艺术家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gustave-moreau-s-mystical-paintings" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832191" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;眼镜熊的惊人匮乏</stitle>; <id>;https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/surprising-dearth-spectacled-bears</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T03:06:02.802996Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/surprising-dearth- spectacled-bears"/>; <author>; <name>;samclemens</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samclemens</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/sites/default/files/dickie_inset_1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 185px;" />;<br />;帕丁顿熊是迈克尔·邦德创作的深受喜爱的角色，原本以非洲为背景，但由于非洲缺乏熊，不得不改为南美。在南美丛林中发现的眼镜熊成为帕丁顿熊的灵感来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-surprising-dearth-of-spectacled-bears" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PLJS – PostreSQL 的 JavaScript 语言插件</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/plv8/pljs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T20:06:02.804084Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/plv8/pljs"/>; <author>; <name>;alonp99</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycom binator.com/user?id=alonp99</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/8a276b6f326c15c50ccc228009144222a992010bf516cb65b21d6ca018f19028/plv8/pljs" style="width: 220 px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;PLJS是一个紧凑、轻量级的PostgreSQL JavaScript语言插件。它使用 QuickJS 作为 JavaScript 引擎，易于构建和维护。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pljs-javascript-language-plugin-for-postresql" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;NATS.io 的高性能服务器，云和边缘本机消息传递系统</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/nats-io/nats-server</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:06:02.805042Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/nats-io/nats-server"/>; <author>; <name>;Kinrany</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Kinrany</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://repository-images.githubusercontent.com/6443435/ac1f0d00-d7e9-11eb-8193-83a08bd77530" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;NATS 是一个简单、安全且高性能的数字系统、服务和设备通信系统。 NATS 是云原生计算基金会 (CNCF) 的一部分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#high-performance-server-for-nats-io-the-cloud-and-edge-native-messaging-system" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820544" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;年轻人纷纷涌向占星学</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T23:06:02.805960Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wash ingtonpost.com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://s3.amazonaws .com/arc-authors/washpost/746a8401-ccc8-492d-986e-b24f68639b61.png&w=196&h=196" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;占星学领域在年轻一代的推动下正在蓬勃发展，到2021年价值将达到128亿美元。许多人转向占星学来寻求自我完善和个人成长。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#young-people-are-flocking-to-astrology" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840674" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;操作面向公众的 API 的建议</stitle>; <id>;https://jcs.org/2023/07/12/api</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T18:06:02.806869Z</updated>; <link href="https://jcs.org/2023/07/12/api"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在 api.example.com 上提供您的 API，而不是在 example.com/api 上。您的 API 在 TLS 版本和密码方面可能也有更宽松的安全限制，您不希望在处理敏感信息的仪表板网站上放松。今天接受来自某人埋在森林中的 ESP8266 的稍微不符合要求的 API 请求可能意味着您将不得不继续接受几年后发出的相同的不符合要求的请求，通常的代价是必须在升级时在 Web 框架或服务器代码中实施解决方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#advice-for-operating-a-public-faceing-api" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821951" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;石墙和历史港口是生物多样性意想不到的避风港</stitle>; <id>;https://hakaimagazine.com/news/stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T20:06:02.807790Z</updated>; <link href="https://hakaimagazine .com/news/stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity/"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hakaimagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/body-culture-masonry.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：118px;“ />;<br />;旧港口基础设施和石墙为多种海洋动物提供了栖息地，有时甚至比自然海岸线更加多样化。研究结果支持保护海洋遗产地，并可为新水下基础设施的设计提供信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stone-walls-and-historical-harbors-are-unexpected-havens-of-biodiversity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821123" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OpenBSD：AMD 处理器微码支持添加到-current</stitle>; <id>;https://undeadly.org/cgi?action=article;sid=20230723185853</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T19:06:02.808776Z</updated>; <link href="https://und eadly.org/cgi?action=article;sid=20230723185853"/>; <author>; <name>;peter_hansteen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=peter_hansteen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;感谢 Jonathan Gray (jsg@) 的一系列提交，-current 现在支持 AMD（amd64 和i386）处理器：很高兴看到对 AMD 方面的支持与对英特尔的支持相当（2018 年增加了对英特尔的支持）。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openbsd-amd-processor-microcode-support-added-to-current" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838511" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Sam Altman 的世界币代币将于周一推出</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-24/sam-altman-s-worldcoin-token-to-launch-monday-semafor-reports</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T06:06:02.809728 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-24/sam-altman-s-worldcoin-token-to-launch-monday-semafor-reports"/>; <作者>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/idazeAGVkqj4/v1/-1x-1.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;OpenAI Inc. 首席执行官 Sam Altman 的加密货币将于周一推出。世界币代币如何分配的详细信息也将被公开。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sam-altmans-worldcoin-token-to-launch-monday" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843469" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我声称 Rich Hickey 关于函数非空参数的说法是错误的 (2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jonstodle.com/in-which-i-claim-rich-hickey-is-wrong/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:06:02.810647Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.jonstodle. com/in-which-i-claim-rich-hickey-is-wrong/"/>; <author>; <name>;Capricorn2481</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Capricorn2481</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.jonstodle.com/images/code-and-sundry.png" style="width: 220px; height: 1 10 像素；” />;<br />;Rich Hickey 认为，将函数的参数从显式非空更改为可能为空不应是重大更改。他还主张同样的方法来收紧返回值的可能值。然而，这忽略了一个事实：改变函数的内部结构可以改变值的含义，调用者应该适应这个新的现实。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-claim-rich-hickey-is-wrong-about-non-null-arguments-to-functions-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840127" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed >;
